title: US, South Korea to Sign Deal Boosting AI, Quantum Cooperation
description: President Donald Trump’s administration is slated to sign a deal with South Korea aimed at bolstering cooperation in artificial intelligence, quantum computing and 6G, according to a US official — part of a bid to maintain a competitive edge with China in an expanding race for tech supremacy.

title: Emma Thompson Erupts over Her 'Intense Irritation' with Artificial Intelligence: 'Just F**k Off'
description: Actress Emma Thompson erupted over her "intense irritation" with artificial intelligence during a recent appearance on CBS' "The Late Show With Stephen Colbert," where she demanded that AI to "f**k off."
content:

title: AI's Impact on Education: Teachers' Vital Role in an Evolving Landscape
description: AICTE Chairman T G Sitharam highlighted the transformative impact of artificial intelligence on education, emphasizing the increased importance of teachers. Speaking at Guru Jambheshwar University's Foundation Day, he stressed the need for upskilling and noted India's progress from an importer to an exporter in research and technology.
content: AICTE Chairman T G Sitharam underscored the transformative impact of artificial intelligence on the landscape of education, marking the increasing significance of educators in adapting to these changes. He expressed these insights during the 31st Fou... [707 chars]

title: Amazon to lay off some 30,000 corporate employees
description: It said the company needs to be organised 'more leanly' to seize opportunities provided by artificial intelligence.
content:
United States e-commerce giant Amazon said it plans to lay off around 30,000 employees in its corporate division.
While this figure represents a small percentage of the company’s 1.55 million employees worldwide, it is nearly 10 per cent of its corpo... [1250 chars]

title: ActiveFence Research Warns of Rising Ethical Risks in AI-Generated Not Safe For Work Content
description: Artificial intelligence has transformed how people create, share, and consume content. From digital art to chat-based storytelling, generative AI models can produce almost anything with a single prompt. However, new findings from ActiveFence show that this power is increasingly being misused to generate sexual material that crosses ethical and legal lines. In its latest research […]

title: Amazon cuts 14,000 corporate jobs as spending on artificial intelligence accelerates
description: In June CEO Andy Jassy, who has aggressively sought to cut costs since becoming CEO in 2021, said that he anticipated generative AI would reduce Amazon’s corporate workforce in the next few years.
content:
Amazon will cut about 14,000 corporate jobs as the online retail giant ramps up spending on artificial intelligence while cutting costs elsewhere.
In June CEO Andy Jassy, who has aggressively sought to cut costs since becoming CEO in 2021, said that ... [4143 chars]

title: Harbour BioMed Launches First Fully Human Generative AI HCAb Model to Accelerate Next-Generation Biologics Discovery
description: **media[802045]**CAMBRIDGE, Mass., ROTTERDAM, Netherlands and SHANGHAI, Oct. 28, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Harbour BioMed (HKEX: 02142), a global biopharmaceutical company focused on the discovery and development of novel antibody therapeutics in immunology and oncology, today announced the launch of its first fully human Generative AI HCAb (Heavy Chain-Only Antibody) Model powered by its Hu-mAtrIx™ AI platform, built upon the Harbour Mice® platform. This platform establishes a closed-loop process integrating AI design, intelligent screening, and wet-lab validation. The announcement was made at the company's Global R&D Day 2025 event in Shanghai.  During the event, the Global AI + Pharmaceutical Ecosystem Alliance was also officially launched. The alliance brings together leading expertise, cutting-edge technologies, and resources from various sectors, aiming to systematically reshape the entire drug R&D process through artificial intelligence technologies, accelerating the development of innovative therapies for the benefit of patients worldwide.
content: CAMBRIDGE, Mass., ROTTERDAM, Netherlands and SHANGHAI, Oct. 28, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Harbour BioMed (HKEX: 02142), a global biopharmaceutical company focused on the discovery and development of novel antibody therapeutics in immunology and oncology, ... [5403 chars]

title: OpenAI Says It Has New For-Profit Business Structure, Adjusts Partnership With Microsoft
description: SAN FRANCISCO (AP) — OpenAI said Tuesday it has reorganized its ownership structure and converted its business into a public benefit corporation, paving the way for the ChatGPT maker to more easily profit off its artificial intelligence technology even as it remains technically under the control of a nonprofit.

title: OpenAI Restructures as For-Profit Company
description: The artificial intelligence company said that the nonprofit that controlled the organization would receive a $130 billion stake in the new company.
content:
OpenAI said on Tuesday that it had adopted a new for-profit structure, a long-sought change that could allow the business to operate like a more traditional company while it raises the billions of dollars it needs to develop artificial intelligence.
